sentences.sContent: I started in France, but my father was a British citizen, born in Mauritius.
sentences.sCn: 我生在法国，但是我的父亲是英国人，出生于毛里求斯。

sentences.sContent: However, as the exhibit shows, Mauritius faces significant economic and social challenges as it transitions from dependence on trade preferences to open competition in the global economy.
sentences.sCn: 然而，正如本次展览所示，在从依赖贸易优惠向参与全球经济竞争过渡的过程中，毛里求斯面临巨大经济社会挑战。

sentences.sContent: Of these, Kenya, Malawi, Mauritius, South Africa and Zimbabwe have all at one time or other used bioethanol as a transport or domestic fuel.
sentences.sCn: 在这些国家中，肯尼亚、马拉维、毛里求斯、南非和津巴布韦都曾经使用生物乙醇作为交通和家用燃料。

trans.tranCn: 毛里求斯（非洲东部岛国）
